name: getDatabasesType
description: Display the details of a single Managed Database type. The type and number of nodes determine the resources and price of a Managed Database instance.

page.description: The page of a collection to return.

page_size.description: The number of items to return per page.

typeId.description: The ID of the Managed Database type.

$ul: **deprecated**: Whether this Database plan type has been deprecated and is no longer available.
**disk**: The amount of disk space set aside for Databases of this plan type. The value is represented in megabytes.
**mongodb**: Pricing details for MongoDB Managed Databases.
**mysql**: Pricing details for MySQL Managed Databases.
**postgresql**: Pricing details for PostgreSQL Managed Databases.
**id**: The ID representing the Managed Database node plan type.
**label**: A human-readable string that describes each plan type. For display purposes only.
**memory**: The amount of RAM allocated to Database created of this plan type. The value is represented in megabytes.
**vcpus**: The integer of number CPUs allocated to databases of this plan type.
